data.question: What is the role of excess zirconium in the formation of PCN-777?
data.answer: It helps to form a six-connected D3d Zr6 building block.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of PCN-777 was supported by the Office of Naval Research.
What is the significance of the D3d symmetry in the context of PCN-777?
data.answer: It allows the formation of a b-cristobalite network with six-connected antiprismatic D3d Zr6 clusters.
